tool_description:
VAT is A value added tax identification number or VAT identification number (VATIN) is an identifier used in many countries, including the countries of the European Union, for value added tax purposes.  Validate VAT Number allows you to verify the validity of a VAT number issued by any European Union Member State.

telegram DM: https://t.me/justmobicode
name: Validate VAT Number
title: Validate VAT Number

api_list.name: VAT validation API endpoint
api_list.description: vat: VAT identification number with country prefix, e.g. IE9803175Q

required_parameters.name: vat
required_parameters.description: VAT identification number with country prefix, e.g. IE9803175
